title: Bayanat, Yahsat and ICEYE announce program to broaden commercial opportunities across the UAE space ecosystem
key_assets: ['SAR satellite constellation (at least 5 LEO satellites)', "ICEYE's SAR satellite technology and existing constellation access", "Bayanat's AI-powered geospatial solutions and downstream capabilities", "Yahsat's satellite infrastructure and upstream/midstream capabilities"]
summary: Bayanat, Yahsat, and ICEYE have announced a comprehensive Space Program to develop national satellite remote sensing and Earth Observation (EO) capabilities in the UAE. The program includes the development of a constellation of at least five SAR LEO satellites, leveraging ICEYE's SAR technology and Yahsat's satellite infrastructure. The partnership aims to enhance commercial offerings, provide sovereign SAR data, and strengthen the UAE's position in space technology.
why_it_matters: This partnership marks a significant step in building a sovereign EO ecosystem in the UAE, enhancing data privacy, and fostering economic growth through advanced space capabilities. It positions the UAE as a key player in the global EO market and strengthens collaboration among strategic entities in the region's space sector.

entities.name: Bayanat
entities.involvement: Lead in AI-powered geospatial solutions and downstream capabilities; developing SAR satellite constellation

entities.name: Yahsat
entities.involvement: Provider of satellite infrastructure and upstream/midstream capabilities
